channel.title: Website on Skycoin Project Material
channel.description: Recent content in Website on Skycoin Project Material

item.title: Development Update #114 - November 04, 2016
item.description: Summary: We need to fix the GUI on the dev branch. We need to debug the CLI (command line interface, for exchange)) We need to get the WebRPC (for exchanges) We need to start building out the community. Need a chat room Need a forum or BBS Need a messaging system We need to get the three white papers done and the website: Coin / Consensus Paper Meshnet Paper Aether Paper Things we need: We have to decide if we will float and do the first market internally or use a third party.
